org.buildmlearn.appstore.activities

Class SplashActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • org.buildmlearn.appstore.activities.SplashActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, android.view.Window.OnWindowDismissedCallback

    public class SplashActivity
extends android.app.Activity
    Shows the splash screen and in the meanwhile, it download and renders the xml file.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        The method is executed when the activity is created. SplashActivity deals with displaying a brand logo and in the meantime download/parse the xml data to be shown on the next page-store.
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.app.Activity
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - When resuming, this bundle will have all the parameters saved for this instance.
        See Also:
        Activity.onStart(), Activity.onSaveInstanceState(android.os.Bundle), Activity.onRestoreInstanceState(android.os.Bundle), Activity.onPostCreate(android.os.Bundle)

      • parseXML

        private void parseXML()
        It parses the xml data to be shown on the store. If the phone is not connected to Internet, it displays a popup for the user to either connect the phone to internet and retry or exit the app.

      • isNetworkAvailable

        private boolean isNetworkAvailable()
        The method check whether the phone is connected to internet or not.
        Returns:
        true: if internet is available and false otherwise.
